Thanks for the reply. I have seen that example, but I wasn't sure if that works because it is using the addData method of the chart. I was trying to replace the full array of data in the series, so not sure if that's what's causing the issue.
I guess the main idea should be similar, since `addData` does nothing special than pushing a new element to the end of the array. You may post some data for me to understand your scenario better.
